episodes.title: How to Spot and Escape Narcissistic or Cult Control
episodes.description:
Narcissists and cult like groups dominated by narcissists  don't need stone walls to build a prison; they build it right inside your mind. They isolate you, warp your perception of reality, and create a tiny world where their rules and their needs are the only things that matter. They break you down not with one big blow, but with a thousand tiny, almost invisible cuts to your psyche, until you forget what it even felt like to be whole.

This livestream looks at the tactics and strategies they use to brainwash, gaslight and gain control over you, and ways to avoid buying into their fantasies.

#narcissist #cults #coercivecontrol

episodes.title: Narcissism and Cults: Echoes of Ego
episodes.description: Mark Vicente is an award winning film maker and author. He is a former member, and one of the whistle blowers that exposed the criminal activities going on in the nexium cult. His story is chronicled in the HBO series, ‘The Vow’. He is host of the ‘WTF is on my mind?’ podcast and YouTube channel where he discusses, among other things, narcissism, coercive behaviours, dark personality and cult behaviours often seen in everyday life. I had the pleasure of talking to Mark about NXIVM, and his journey from member to whistle blower, the personality types behind cult movements and how they mirror the same dynamics and patterns found in romantic relationships, families and organisations dominated by narcissists. More details about Mark and his work can be found at: WEBSITES https://www.markvicente.com/ https://www.empathynotincluded.com/ PODCAST & SOCIALS https://www.youtube.com/@markvicente7 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/wtf-is-on-my-mind/id1646783869 https://www.instagram.com/markvicente/ https://www.tiktok.com/@mark_vicente https://x.com/markvicente If you find this video interesting please consider supporting me on either Patreon or Substack https://www.patreon.com/dfmagee https://darrenfmagee.substack.com/ You can also watch this conversation on my Youtube Channel. https://www.youtube.com/@DarrenFMagee #cults #NXIVM #narcissisticpsychopathy
